uk.ac.sanger.cgp.autocsa.analysis

Class SeqTraceComparison

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.sanger.cgp.autocsa.analysis.SeqTraceComparison

  • public class SeqTraceComparison
extends java.lang.Object

    Workhorse Class for Sequence Trace Comparison operations.

    Original author: Ed Dicks
    Version:
    $Revision$

    $Author$

        public int getNumHetMutations(int fromBaseNo)
        Gets the number of point Heterozygous substitutions occuring after the specified base number.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • reportCoverage

        public void reportCoverage(int ROIStartCoord,
                  int ROIEndCoord,
                  int refSeqLength)
        Reports coverage information on the current STS wrt STS and ROI
        Parameters:
        ROIStartCoord - the starting ROI coordinate
        ROIEndCoord - the ending ROI coordinate
        refSeqLength - the length of the amplimer sequence

      • getComparisonQuality

        public int getComparisonQuality()
        Gets a measure of the Comparison Quality. This is calculated as the average over the traces of the (base corrected) intensity ratios of the two traces, expressed in the range [1,100].
        Returns:
        the Comparison Quality in the range [1,100].

      • getComparisonLimits

        public int[] getComparisonLimits()
        Gets an array of Comparison limits of the amplimer.
        Returns:
        the int[2] array of comparison limits (base numbers)

      • testHetIndel

        public int testHetIndel()
        Performs a test for any Heterozygous Insertions or Deletions.
        Returns:
        the status code of the test (1: DEL, 2: INS else: NONE)

      • setIndelBasePosition

        public void setIndelBasePosition(int ipos)
        Saves and sets the supplied Het Indel position to a valid value for use in Het Indel detection. The supplied value has 5 subtracted so the real Het position is not passed. Also, the resultant position may be altered so it's a base number that has been analysed.
        Parameters:
        ipos - the initial position of the suspected Het Indel

      • finalHetMutationScan

        public void finalHetMutationScan(SeqTraceAnalysis cTrace,
                        SeqTraceAnalysis sTrace)
